NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
BELLS: Friends, has anyone else heard of a second <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> built by our friends?
2
1
FILIX: Could you be recalling the <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> built on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin's</color> south pole, Bells? We saw that during our first journey to <color=lightblue>Ember Twin!</color>
3
2
BELLS: Yes, that must be it! I recall our excitement seeing that device on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin's</color> surface now.. The relief that our friends had survived and thrived on such a hostile planet was infectious!
4
3
BELLS: I have heard that unlike the locator here on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow,</color> their <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> is able to track the precise position of the wandering moon.
5
4
BELLS: We were so overwhelmed in the joy of our reunion, I did not think to inquire how their device worked! I hope to study it to improve the <color=orange>Sixth Location Locator</color> here on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> too.
6
4
FILIX: How fascinating! I must visit this locator when I next visit <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color> to see how differently it works from the <color=orange>Sixth Location Locator!</color>
Workshop R3 8
